snippet: Manchester City turned on the style Saturday, helped by a free-kick goal after five minutes Aleksandar Kolarov, in a shut-out victory over Sunderland in the English Premier League.
lead_paragraph: Manchester City turned on the style Saturday, helped by a free-kick goal after five minutes Aleksandar Kolarov, in a shut-out victory over Sunderland in the English Premier League.

headline.seo: Manchester City Scores Early in Easy Win Over Sunderland
headline.main: Manchester City Gets Easy Win Over Sunderland
headline.print_headline: Manchester City Scores Early and Moves to Second in the Premier League
